Name: Juicy Army: Prologue
About the game: Juicy army is the sweetest action roguelike set in a dream universe where you'll have to fight an army of juicy creatures! Prologue Features: Discover a world full of delicious treats! This fantasy kingdom is made of sweet and delightful objects! There are 5 biomes - Strawberry, Cheese, Candy, Donut, and Chocolate. Exotic fruity enemies! There are flying grapes, bouncing orange, sniper apple, pineapple bandit, and a lot of other juicy creatures. But don't let their cute appearance fool you! They may look cute, but they can get vicious quickly! As you progress, you'll find loads of interesting weapons. Throughout your journey, you'll unlock new items, each with different strengths. Harness the power of these new abilities and smash through all obstacles! Responsive, fluid, and fun to play combat system! Procedurally generated worlds blended with handcrafted design elements to keep each run fresh and unique. Beautiful and adorable art style!
